apply.message: You are not allowed to modify terrain here!
You are not allowed to block the spawners!
You may not edit outside the map!
You can only modify blocks placed by a player!

item.name: `rPermanent Shears
item.lore: `7Great for getting rid of wool.|

item.name: `fWood Pickaxe
item.lore: `7This is an upgradeable item.|`7It will lose 1 tier upon death!||`7You will permanently respawn|`7with at least the lowest tier.|

item.lore: `7This is an upgradeable item.|`7It will lose 1 tier upon death!||`7You will permanently respawn|`7with at least the lowest tier.|

item.name: `fFireball
item.lore: `7Right-click to launch! Great for|`7knocking off enemies walking on|`7thin bridges.|

item.name: `6TNT
item.lore: `7Instantly ignites once placed.|
`7Great for briding across islands.

item.name: `rBlastproof Glass
item.lore: `bMore than one layer of glass|`bmay be required to prevent blast|`bdamage to blocks below.||`bYour bed is immune to TNT and Fireballs.||

item.name: `fPermanent Shears
item.lore: `7Great for getting rid of wool.|

item.lore: `7This is an upgradeable item.|`7It will lose 1 tier upon death!||`7You will permanently respawn|`7with at least the lowest tier.|

item.name: `aInvisibility (0:30)
item.lore: `bArmor will be stashed and replaced|`bwith absorption while invisible.||`bAbsorption scaled to armor material.||`bTools still show while invisible!|

item.name: `6Golden Apple
item.lore: `7Well-rounded healing.|

item.name: `fSlowball
item.lore: `7Gives Slowness for 8 seconds|`7and brief Confusion to enemies.|

item.name: `fBrain Befriender
item.lore: `7Zombie ally to help defend your|`7base, or use for attacks.|

item.name: `fFireball
item.lore: `7Right-click to launch! Great for|`7knocking off enemies walking on|`7thin bridges.|

item.name: `6TNT
item.lore: `7Instantly ignites, appropriate|`7to explode things!|

item.name: `aEnder Pearl
item.lore: `7The quickest way to invade enemy|`7bases.|

item.name: `6Water Bucket
item.lore: `7Great for slowing down approaching|`7enemies. Can also protect|`7against TNT.|

item.name: `6Magic Milk
item.lore: `7Avoid triggering traps for 30|`7seconds after consuming.

item.name: `6Sponge
item.lore: `7Great for soaking up water.|

item.name: `aSugar Cookie
item.lore: `7Gain Speed III and Jump IV for|`715 seconds!|

item.name: `6Speed Star
item.lore: `7Gain Speed I while holding|

item.name: `4`lSharpened Swords
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Sharpness I on all swords.|

item.name: `e`lReinforced Armor I
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Protection I on all armor pieces.||`7Tier 1: Protection I, `b5 Diamonds|`7Tier 2: Protection II, `b10 Diamonds|`7Tier 3: Protection III, `b20 Diamonds|`7Tier 4: Protection IV, `b25 Diamonds|

item.name: `e`lReinforced Armor II
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Protection II on all armor pieces.||`2Tier 1: Protection I, `b5 Diamonds|`7Tier 2: Protection II, `b10 Diamonds|`7Tier 3: Protection III, `b20 Diamonds|`7Tier 4: Protection IV, `b25 Diamonds|

item.name: `e`lReinforced Armor III
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Protection III on all armor pieces.||`2Tier 1: Protection I, `b5 Diamonds|`2Tier 2: Protection II, `b10 Diamonds|`7Tier 3: Protection III, `b20 Diamonds|`7Tier 4: Protection IV, `b25 Diamonds|

item.name: `e`lReinforced Armor IV
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Protection IV on all armor pieces.||`2Tier 1: Protection I, `b5 Diamonds|`2Tier 2: Protection II, `b10 Diamonds|`2Tier 3: Protection III, `b20 Diamonds|`7Tier 4: Protection IV, `b25 Diamonds|

item.name: `6`lManiac Miner I
item.lore: `7All players on your team|`7permanently gain Haste I.||`7Tier 1: Haste I, `b4 Diamonds|`7Tier 2: Haste II, `b4 Diamonds|

item.name: `6`lManiac Miner II
item.lore: `7All players on your team|`7permanently gain Haste II.||`2Tier 1: Haste I, `b4 Diamonds|`7Tier 2: Haste II, `b4 Diamonds|

item.name: `b`lIron Forge (Tier 1)
item.lore: `7Upgrade resource spawning:||`7Tier 1: +50% Resources, `b4 Diamonds|`7Tier 2: +100% Resources, `b8 Diamonds|`7Tier 3: Spawn Emeralds, `b12 Diamonds|`7Tier 4: +200% Resources, `b16 Diamonds|

item.name: `b`lGold Forge (Tier 2)
item.lore: `7Upgrade resource spawning:||`2Tier 1: +50% Resources, `b4 Diamonds|`7Tier 2: +100% Resources, `b8 Diamonds|`7Tier 3: Spawn Emeralds, `b12 Diamonds|`7Tier 4: +200% Resources, `b16 Diamonds|

item.name: `b`lEmerald Forge (Tier 3)
item.lore: `7Upgrade resource spawning:||`2Tier 1: +50% Resources, `b4 Diamonds|`2Tier 2: +100% Resources, `b8 Diamonds|`7Tier 3: Spawn Emeralds, `b12 Diamonds|`7Tier 4: +200% Resources, `b16 Diamonds|

item.name: `b`lMolten Forge (Tier 4)
item.lore: `7Upgrade resource spawning:||`2Tier 1: +50% Resources, `b4 Diamonds|`2Tier 2: +100% Resources, `b8 Diamonds|`2Tier 3: Spawn Emeralds, `b12 Diamonds|`7Tier 4: +200% Resources, `b16 Diamonds|

item.name: `d`lHeal Pool
item.lore: `7Creates a Regeneration field|`7around your base.|

item.name: `d`lAlarm Trap
item.lore: `7Reveals invisible players and |`7displays alert to your team.||`2Trap Queue Priority: #1|

item.name: `e`lMiner Fatigue Trap
item.lore: `7Inflict Mining Fatigue for 10|`7seconds.||`2Trap Queue Priority: #2|

item.name: `c`lIt's a Trap!
item.lore: `7Inflicts Blindness and Slowness|`7for 6 seconds.||`2Trap Queue Priority: #3|

item.name: `2`lCounter-Offensive Trap
item.lore: `7Grants Speed and Jump Boost|`7to your team at your base.||`2Trap Queue Priority: #4|

item.name: `5`lProximity Alert Flares
item.lore: `7Permanent proximity flares|`7with audible sparks and colored|`7firework matching invading team.||`4Not affected by Magic Milk!|
